Thanks to this Coronavirus Emergency Supplemental, we'll be adding needed funding for Medicare #telehealth services, making more diagnostic tests available, supporting more treatments, investing in vaccine development, &ensuring we're better prepared for any future health threat.

PAHPAIA strengthens our national security by ensuring our National Strategic Stockpiles have the equipment needed to respond to threats just like the coronavirus. It also focuses on the needs of children, people w/disabilities & seniors before & during a #publichealth emergency.

I'm proud to have supported PAHPAIA, a #bipartisan bill which originated in @HouseCommerce & was signed into law last year.PAHPAIA ensures #healthcare professionals are trained to respond to possible pandemic outbreaks.

Ensuring the American people are safe is the most important job of government. Thankfully, today's vote is not the first time we've boosted our efforts to combat infectious diseases & #publichealth threats. https://t.co/rvH7IPjTBg
